e9c124ec919e.title: I used to feel sorry for the “Red” states, when it came to things that hurt their state, tax cuts…

content.subtitle: Can’t have those Dem’s and liberal in their state because they are heathens and the big guy in the sky (so they think) is going to make…

paragraphs.name: 8eaa
paragraphs.text: I used to feel sorry for the “Red” states, when it came to things that hurt their state, tax cuts for the rich, education cuts, tornadoes, flooding,………..but now I don’t. They voted for them, they bought it and there are no returns. When I see the weather on the news and see the destruction, I don;t care anymore. Call me heartless but they have no one…

paragraphs.name: 65c5
paragraphs.text: There are a couple of responses that imply this article “is just opinion”, which I assume means they disagree with it. It may be opinion, but it’s also fact. My primary worry is for the kids — the healthcare problems, and the school problems are awful. The last Kansas budget news I heard, Brownback wanted to take money from the highway department and…

paragraphs.text: Since this is Kansas we’re talking about, I’m pretty sure the fitting punishment for such greed and arrogance is tarring and feathering.

d5855be7980a.title: The Paul Ryan vision for America is to turn our entire country into Kansas.

paragraphs.name: b4e7
paragraphs.text: The Paul Ryan vision for America is to turn our entire country into Kansas. The simple facts are that Republican economic ideas are grounded in a myth of trickle down prosperity that has never existed in reality. It does have a proven track record of making the largest donors to the Republican Party immensely more wealthy and making the middle class…

f1d0a60a8b36.title: fifth grade math has been a problem for brownback….made

paragraphs.name: 309f
paragraphs.text: fifth grade math has been a problem for brownback….made obvious by his economic plan…..by now he’s cut so much from public schools that fifth grade math may be a problem for the whole state for years to come……i suspect that was part of the plan from the git.

eae1eed63b10.title: you might want to check on all states led by the GOP.

paragraphs.name: eae3
paragraphs.text: you might want to check on all states led by the GOP. I think they all fought the ACA and their people are paying because of it. They all lowered corporate taxes as well as taxes on rich. I believe if your debt is paid off by all means lower taxes but you cannot pay down debt by lowering your income(try it at your house)

183ed62e5186.title: In all fairness, our economic problems in Kansas are because of the republicans governing the state…

paragraphs.name: 39ed
paragraphs.text: In all fairness, our economic problems in Kansas are because of the republicans governing the state and not just Mr. brownback. Brownback didn’t ruin us by himself. The republicans and republican voters put him in office and cleared the way for his, “experiment” , to ruin our economy.

paragraphs.name: b097
paragraphs.text: This was carried on Yahoo news as a real news story when it isn’t. It is opinion. While much of it is true representing it as independent reporting is itself misleading.

ce2441413a52.title: This guy has destroyed a state, why would he be considered for such a position.

paragraphs.name: 6c6d
paragraphs.text: This guy has destroyed a state, why would he be considered for such a position. I thought this administration was into “extreme vetting”. This guy should just get out of public life and move back into the private sector. He is a DISASTER, A HUGE DISASTER…..

768cc67ae2b2.title: The really pathetic thing is this.

paragraphs.name: e48f
paragraphs.text: The really pathetic thing is this. Republicans in the legislature have gone along with him until this last session. Until the majority of them begin to act ethically and morally we in Kansas will not get out of the mess this idiot put us in.

5c65f5318ff2.title: Sam Browback’s experiment is costing the residents of Kansas for a long time.

paragraphs.name: 44c1
paragraphs.text: Sam Browback’s experiment is costing the residents of Kansas for a long time. And Trump is giving them and the rest of the country a slap in the face with another loser.
